member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX
member.summary: Contains statistical information from the NTFS file system.Support for this structure started with Windows 10.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.LogFileFullExceptions
member.summary: The number of exceptions generated due to the log file being full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.OtherExceptions
member.summary: The number of other exceptions generated.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the master file table (MFT).

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2Writes
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT mirror.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT mirror.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT mirror performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Mft2WritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.RootIndexReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.RootIndexReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.RootIndexWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.RootIndexWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the bitmap performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of bitmap write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.BitmapWritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT bitmap performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT bitmap write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT bitmap writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.UserIndexReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.UserIndexReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.UserIndexWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.UserIndexWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.LogFileReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.LogFileReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.LogFileWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.LogFileWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.Calls
member.summary: The number of individual calls to allocate clusters.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.RunsReturned
member.summary: The number of runs used to satisfy all the requests.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.Hints
member.summary: The number of times a hint was specified.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.HintsHonored
member.summary: The number of times the hint was useful.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.Cache
member.summary: The number of times the cache was useful other than the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.CacheMiss
member.summary: The number of times the cache was not useful.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.Clusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.HintsClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated through the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.CacheClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated through the cache other than the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.Allocate.CacheMissClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated without the cache.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.DiskResourcesExhausted
member.summary: The number of failed attempts made to acquire a slab of storage for use on the current thinly provisioned volume.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.VolumeTrimCount
member.summary: The number of volume level trim operations issued.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.VolumeTrimTime
member.summary: The total time elapsed during all volume level trim operations. This value, divided by the frequency value from or KeQueryPerformanceCounter, will give the time in seconds.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.VolumeTrimByteCount
member.summary: The total number of bytes issued by all volume level trim operations.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.FileLevelTrimCount
member.summary: The number of file level trim operations issued.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.FileLevelTrimTime
member.summary: The total time elapsed during all file level trim operations. This value, divided by the frequency value from or KeQueryPerformanceCounter, will give the time in seconds.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.FileLevelTrimByteCount
member.summary: The total number of bytes issued by all file level trim operations.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.VolumeTrimSkippedCount
member.summary: The number of times a volume level trim operation was aborted before being sent down through the storage stack.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS_EX.VolumeTrimSkippedByteCount
member.summary: The number of bytes that were not sent through a volume level trim operation because they were skipped.
